Cadillac CTS-V 0-60 times

Autotk.com offers accurate information on Cadillac CTS-V 0-60 times and quarter mile from trusted sources. You may also keep track of how 0-60 times of Cadillac CTS-V changed across years and check out the model’s competitors with the same acceleration performance.

Our mission is to present an easy-to-read and comprehensive information on Cadillac CTS-V 0-60 mph and quarter mile for the devoted geeks, as it is an essential indicator of the vehicle power.

CarAndDriver Test Results

  • - Zero to 60 mph: 3.6 sec
  • - Zero to 100 mph: 7.5 sec
  • - Zero to 130 mph: 13.6 sec
  • - Zero to 150 mph: 17.4 sec
  • - Zero to 170 mph: 25.8 sec
  • - Rolling start, 5-60 mph: 3.8 sec
  • - Top gear, 30-50 mph: 2.0 sec
  • - Top gear, 50-70 mph: 2.1 sec
  • - Standing ¼-mile: 11.8 sec @ 124 mph
  • - Top speed (drag ltd, mfr's claim): 200 mph
  • - Braking, 70-0 mph: 149 ft
  • - Roadholding, 300-ft-dia skidpad: 0.98 g

 

2016 Cadillac CTS-V 0-60 MPH Test Video – 200 MPH 640 Horsepower Supercharged V8

A best 0-60 MPH acceleration test time of 3.9 seconds happens with the Drive Mode set to “Track” and the Performance Traction Management set to “Race” with Traction Control “Off” and Launch Control “On.”

 

2016 Cadillac CTS-V Acceleration Testing

Testing the factory stock 640 hp 2016 Cadillac CTS-V acceleration from 0 to 190 mph (188.7 mph on GPS). Acceleration numbers were measured with a Racelogic VBox GPS system.

 

2013 Cadillac CTS-V Coupe - Acceleration Drag Test Video - Launch, 0 - 60 1/4 mile

  • - 0-60 - 3.90 seconds
  • - 0-100 - 9.10 seconds
  • - 60-130 mph - 11.80 seconds

 

0-60 mph run in 2007 Cadillac CTS-V

 

2014 Cadillac CTS AWD 0-60 MPH Acceleration Test Video - 318 HP 3.6 Liter V-6 Engine

The 2014 Cadillac CTS posted a best 0-60 MPH time of 6.0 seconds with the Drive Mode set to "Sport" and the Traction Control System turned "Off"
